column2: Realm of Kings: Son of Hulk (2010) #1
column6: Meet a new monster for a new age, and a challenger to the warring Kings of the Cosmos...he is Hiro-Kala, SON OF HULK, and this young apocalyptic visionary has a destructive destiny: obliterate the Universe! This monsterous Son of Hulk has been abducted to Jarella's sub-atomic world deep in the Microverse, where his father once found love and acceptance.  Now he must battle an invasion force of murderous aliens...even if it means unlocking a new, horrifying power within him that can never be controlled. Book one of "THE CONQUEST OF JARELLA'S WORLD", a mind-breaking adventure from critically acclaimed writer, Scott Reed. Parental Advisory ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Alex Garner | penciller:MIGUEL MUNERA | writer:Scott Reed
